TC01.SQL: DECLARE @DATETIME_ID varchar(50)=DATETIME_VALUE , @NR_NAME varchar(50)=UNIQUE_ID_VALUE select CAST(ROUND(avg(KPI_Value), 2) AS NUMERIC(36,2)) AS kpiValue from (SELECT (SUM(D2.PMRLCDELAYTIMEDL2)+SUM(D1.PMRLCDELAYTIMEDL))/(SUM(D2.PMRLCDELAYPKTTRANSDL)+SUM(D1.PMRLCDELAYPKTTRANSMITDL)) as KPI_Value  FROM DC_E_NR_NRCELLDU_RAW D1, DC_E_ERBS_EUTRANCELLFDD_RAW D2  ,DIM_E_LTE_SHARINGGRP D3 WHERE D1.DATE_ID=@DATETIME_ID and  D1.ROWSTATUS NOT IN ('DUPLICATE','SUSPECTED')   AND D1.NR_NAME IN (@NR_NAME) AND D1.OSS_ID = D2.OSS_ID AND D1.DATETIME_ID=D2.DATETIME_ID AND D1.NR_NAME=D2.ERBS  AND D1.OSS_ID = D3.OSS_ID AND D1.SN = D3.NE_FDN AND D1.MOID = D3.gUtranCellRelationRef_DN AND D2.OSS_ID = D3.OSS_ID AND D2.SN = D3.NE_FDN AND D2.MOID = D3.eUtranCellRef_DN GROUP BY D2.DATETIME_ID,D2.ENodeBFunction,D2.ERBS,D2.EUtranCellFDD,D2.MOID,D2.NESW,D2.OSS_ID,D2.SN,D1.DATETIME_ID,D1.GNBDUFunction,D1.MOID,D1.NRCellDU,D1.NR_NAME,D1.OSS_ID,D1.SN)A

TC02.SQL: select CAST(ROUND(avg(KPI_Value), 2) AS NUMERIC(36,2)) AS kpiValue from (SELECT 100*((D1.PMPRBUSEDDLBCCH+D1.PMPRBUSEDDLDTCH+D1.PMPRBUSEDDLPCCH+D1.PMPRBUSEDDLSRBFIRSTTRANS+D2.PMPRBUSEDPDSCHNR)/(D2.PMPRBAVAILDL)) as KPI_Value FROM DC_E_ERBS_EUTRANCELLFDD_RAW D1, DC_E_ERBS_SHARINGGROUP_RAW D2 ,DIM_E_LTE_SHARINGGRP D3 WHERE D1.DATE_ID= @DATETIME_ID and D1.ROWSTATUS NOT IN ('DUPLICATE','SUSPECTED') AND D2.ERBS IN (@ERBS) AND D1.OSS_ID = D2.OSS_ID AND D1.DATE_ID=D2.DATETIME_ID AND D2.ERBS=D1.ERBS AND D1.OSS_ID = D3.OSS_ID AND D1.SN = D3.NE_FDN AND D1.MOID = D3.eUtranCellRef_DN AND D2.OSS_ID = D3.OSS_ID AND D2.SN = D3.NE_FDN AND D2.MOID = D3.sharingGroup_DN GROUP BY D1.DATETIME_ID,D1.ENodeBFunction,D1.ERBS,D1.EUtranCellFDD,D1.MOID,D1.NESW,D1.OSS_ID,D1.SN,D2.DATETIME_ID,D2.ENodeBFunction,D2.ERBS,D2.MOID,D2.NESW,D2.OSS_ID,D2.SN,D2.SharingGroup,D2.SpectrumSharingFunction)A

TC03.SQL: DECLARE @DATETIME_ID varchar(50)=DATETIME_VALUE , @NR_NAME varchar(50)=UNIQUE_ID_VALUE select CAST(ROUND(avg(KPI_Value), 2) AS NUMERIC(36,2)) AS kpiValue from (SELECT (SUM(D2.PMRLCDELAYTIMEDL2)+SUM(D1.PMRLCDELAYTIMEDL))/(SUM(D2.PMRLCDELAYPKTTRANSDL)+SUM(D1.PMRLCDELAYPKTTRANSMITDL)) as KPI_Value  FROM DC_E_NR_NRCELLDU_RAW D1, DC_E_ERBS_EUTRANCELLFDD_RAW D2  ,DIM_E_LTE_SHARINGGRP D3 WHERE D1.DATE_ID=@DATETIME_ID and  D1.ROWSTATUS NOT IN ('DUPLICATE','SUSPECTED')   AND D1.NR_NAME IN (@NR_NAME) AND D1.OSS_ID = D2.OSS_ID AND D1.DATETIME_ID=D2.DATETIME_ID AND D1.NR_NAME=D2.ERBS  AND D1.OSS_ID = D3.OSS_ID AND D1.SN = D3.NE_FDN AND D1.MOID = D3.gUtranCellRelationRef_DN AND D2.OSS_ID = D3.OSS_ID AND D2.SN = D3.NE_FDN AND D2.MOID = D3.eUtranCellRef_DN GROUP BY D2.DATETIME_ID,D2.ENodeBFunction,D2.ERBS,D2.EUtranCellFDD,D2.MOID,D2.NESW,D2.OSS_ID,D2.SN,D1.DATETIME_ID,D1.GNBDUFunction,D1.MOID,D1.NRCellDU,D1.NR_NAME,D1.OSS_ID,D1.SN)A
